metadata.title: Zuply8 - Advanced Planning for Wholesalers & Retailers
metadata.description: Transform your planning cycle with Zuply8. Forecast demand, plan purchasing with precision, and unlock working capital. Trusted by modern planning teams.

hero.headline: Know what to buy, when to buy it, and how it fuels your next quarter.
hero.subheadline: Zuply8 brings purchasing, demand, and inventory planning into one advanced workspace. See how your business will evolve, keep priority items ready, and release cash from what can wait.

challenges.title: Trade messy planning cycles for foresight and control.
challenges.subtitle: Zuply8 focuses on the realities wholesalers and retailers navigate daily: service commitments, supplier constraints, and dynamic demand.
painPoints: Hours lost every week wrestling with spreadsheets and stale data.
Guesswork on what to replenish first, leading to costly stockouts.
Inventory bloated with products that aren't moving fast enough.
positiveOutcomes: A single reliable view of demand and purchasing priorities.
Confidence that the right SKUs stay available for key accounts.
Working capital freed up to fuel merchandising and growth.

pillars.title: The advanced planning cockpit your team can rely on.
pillars.subtitle: Zuply8 aligns demand signals with smart purchasing recommendations so your planners spend less time reconciling data and more time driving growth.

items.title: Forecast demand with clarity
items.description: Blend historical patterns, seasonality, and promotions so every planning cycle starts with a confident demand signal.

items.title: Plan purchasing with precision
items.description: Translate demand into smart order recommendations that respect supplier lead times, pack sizes, and service targets.

items.title: Unlock working capital
items.description: Keep critical SKUs in stock while trimming excess on slow movers to free cash and reinvest in growth initiatives.

flow.title: Plan the right mix every cycle.
flow.subtitle: Connect demand visibility with purchasing execution. Zuply8 gives you the guardrails to protect service levels while dynamically managing inventory.

steps.title: Segment what matters
steps.description: Identify the SKUs that drive revenue, margin, or customer promises so the team knows where to focus first.

steps.title: Model forward scenarios
steps.description: Preview how demand shifts, supplier changes, or new launches will impact inventory weeks before decisions are due.

steps.title: Act with agility
steps.description: Turn plans into purchase orders, allocation moves, and replenishment tasks that keep operations nimble and resilient.

testimonials.title: Teams trust Zuply8 to keep them ready for every demand shift.
testimonials.subtitle: Hear how wholesalers and retailers are unlocking service level confidence while freeing up working capital.
